Title: Relates to apportioning aid for career education in certain schools
Summary: Relates to apportioning aid for career in education in school districts located in a city with a population between 62,000 and 65,000 or between 67,000 and 70,000 as recorded in the 2010 census.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to apportioning aid for career education in certain schools
